topic.title: Opening a File as Read-Only in

keywords.indexterm: Oxygen XML Web Author ComponentOpen a file as read-only

p.note: This topic assumes that you are using a URLStreamHandler plugin to open the files in your repository.

body.p: When a file is opened, your plugin is asked to provide a URLConnection object that uses to read the contents of the file.

By opening the file as read-only, the is instructed to visually warn users that the content of the document cannot edited. This is an alternative to having them edit the content and then receive an error when trying to check it in.
